        public Trigger(processing.core.PApplet parent)

        Parameters:
        parent -

    • Method Detail

      • callTrigger

        public void callTrigger(boolean trigger)
        Checks whether the condition sent as the parameter is true and calls the triggerEvent() once and execute the code in it. Then, it prevents calling triggerEvent() again multiple times while the condition is true, as frames are being updated within draw().
        It resets when trigger turns false
        Parameters:
        trigger - the specified condition to call the triggerEvent()

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Checks whether the condition sent to callTrigger() is true.
        Returns:
        true if conditions sent to callTrigger() are true.

      • getNumExecutions

        public int getNumExecutions()
        Returns the number of times the callTrigger() method was called and completed it's task.
        Returns:
        the number of executions.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
